Banner.Description: My main goal is to strive for excellence in my work. Every task, every line of code, and every project represents a new opportunity for me. Through these opportunities, I aim for continuous growth by improving myself and achieving better results. For me, excellence is not about achieving perfection but striving to move forward every day. My life motto is: “Once you start walking the path, the way becomes clear!”. This motto inspires me to take bold steps in any situation and continue growing on my journey.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: During my one-year experience, I have had the opportunity to work in various roles as both a backend and frontend developer. Throughout my work, I frequently use .NET and Angular technologies. Programming is not only my job but also my personal interest. It allows me to strengthen my knowledge and gain new experiences. I am always ready to learn new technologies and apply them in real-world projects.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: .NET Developer
Description: Integrated user interfaces and backend systems.
Developed RESTful APIs for data exchange.
Set up CI/CD pipelines via Azure and deployed the application to an IIS server.
Monitored system performance using Application Insights, tracking real-time system efficiency.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CarAccounting
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This project is designed to help users manage and track their car-related expenses. It allows users to monitor fuel consumption, service costs, and other vehicle-related expenditures.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: WebTotalCommander
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: WebTotalCommander is a browser-based file manager that allows users to manage files online. It provides an easy-to-use web interface for seamless file management. The project offers an interface that enables users to efficiently manage files and directories.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hands Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It features the use of services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Countries Viewer
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interface that consumes a countries API where you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four Card Feature Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page with a minimalist design listing 4 features in 4 cards. Entry animations are used with Angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social Proof Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a design made in Figma. Angular was used for development along with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ Accordion Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Frequently asked questions accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple design of a page featuring a profile card with basic information of a person.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
